entries.seo_title: Premium Hair Extensions - 100% Virgin Human Hair | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Shop luxury virgin hair extensions, bundles, closures & frontals. Brazilian, Vietnamese, Peruvian, Malaysian & Indian hair. Free shipping over $150.

data.name: Hair Extensions
data.description: Transform your look with our premium 100% virgin human hair extensions. We source the finest quality hair from Brazil, Vietnam, Peru, Malaysia, India, and Cambodia. All our hair is ethically sourced, cuticle-aligned, and can be colored, bleached, and styled.

entries.seo_title: Brazilian Virgin Hair Bundles & Extensions | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Premium Brazilian virgin hair bundles in body wave, straight, deep wave & kinky curly. 100% unprocessed, cuticle-aligned human hair.

data.name: Brazilian Hair
data.description: Brazilian hair is known for its versatility and durability. Our 100% virgin Brazilian bundles are soft, thick from root to tip, and hold curls beautifully. Perfect for all textures and styles.

entries.seo_title: Vietnamese Virgin Hair - Raw Unprocessed Hair | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Luxury Vietnamese raw virgin hair. Silky smooth, naturally straight, minimal processing. The finest quality Asian hair available.

data.name: Vietnamese Hair
data.description: Vietnamese hair is considered one of the highest quality hairs in the world. Our raw Vietnamese bundles are collected from single donors, never chemically processed, and known for their incredible shine, silky texture, and longevity. Can last 3-5 years with proper care.

entries.seo_title: Peruvian Virgin Hair Extensions | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Shop Peruvian virgin hair bundles. Lightweight, silky, and perfect for a natural look. Body wave, straight & loose wave available.

data.name: Peruvian Hair
data.description: Peruvian hair is lightweight yet full-bodied with a natural luster. Our virgin Peruvian bundles blend seamlessly with most hair textures and are perfect for creating natural, everyday looks.

entries.seo_title: Malaysian Virgin Hair Bundles | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Premium Malaysian virgin hair. Incredibly soft, shiny, and manageable. Perfect for silk press and sleek styles.

data.name: Malaysian Hair
data.description: Malaysian hair is renowned for its incredible softness and natural shine. Our virgin Malaysian bundles are perfect for achieving that sleek, silky look and hold straightened styles beautifully.

entries.seo_title: Indian Remy & Temple Hair Extensions | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Authentic Indian Remy and temple hair bundles. Natural wave pattern, easy to maintain, great for beginners.

data.name: Indian Hair
data.description: Indian hair is one of the most popular and accessible virgin hair types. Our Indian Remy bundles have a natural wave pattern that blends well with relaxed and natural African American hair textures.

entries.seo_title: Cambodian Virgin Hair - Raw Luxury Hair | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Rare Cambodian raw virgin hair. Naturally wavy, thick, and long-lasting. A hidden gem in luxury hair.

data.name: Cambodian Hair
data.description: Cambodian hair is a hidden gem in the hair industry. Our raw Cambodian bundles are naturally wavy, incredibly thick, and known for their durability. Perfect for those who want volume and body.

entries.seo_title: Burmese Virgin Hair - Luxury Raw Hair | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Premium Burmese raw virgin hair. Thick, naturally wavy, and perfect for voluminous styles.

data.name: Burmese Hair
data.description: Burmese hair is known for its thickness and natural wave pattern. Our raw Burmese bundles are perfect for creating full, voluminous styles and hold curls exceptionally well.

entries.seo_title: Lace Closures - HD & Transparent Lace | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: HD lace closures, transparent lace closures, and silk base closures. 4x4, 5x5, 6x6 sizes. Perfect for sew-ins.

data.name: Closures
data.description: Complete your sew-in with our premium lace closures. Available in HD lace, transparent lace, and silk base options. Sizes include 4x4, 5x5, and 6x6. Pre-plucked with baby hairs for a natural hairline.

entries.seo_title: Lace Frontals - 13x4 & 13x6 HD Lace | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Premium 13x4 and 13x6 lace frontals. HD lace, transparent lace. Ear to ear coverage for versatile styling.

data.name: Frontals
data.description: Our lace frontals provide ear-to-ear coverage for maximum styling versatility. Available in 13x4 and 13x6 sizes with HD lace or transparent lace options. Pre-plucked and bleached knots available.

entries.seo_title: Human Hair Wigs - Lace Front & Full Lace Wigs | Bakalr Boutique
entries.seo_description: Shop premium human hair wigs. Lace front wigs, full lace wigs, U-part wigs, headband wigs. Ready to wear or custom made.

data.name: Wigs
data.description: Our collection of human hair wigs offers instant glam. Choose from lace front wigs, full lace wigs, U-part wigs, and headband wigs. Available in various lengths, colors, and textures.
data.short_description: Lace front, full lace & glueless wigs

data.name: Lace Front Wigs
data.description: Natural-looking lace front wigs with pre-plucked hairlines. Perfect for beginners and everyday wear.

data.name: Full Lace Wigs
data.description: 360-degree styling freedom with our full lace wigs. Wear high ponytails, updos, and any style you desire.

data.name: Glueless Wigs
data.description: No glue, no tape, no problem! Our glueless wigs feature adjustable straps and combs for secure, damage-free wear.

data.name: Colored Wigs
data.description: Pre-colored wigs in blonde, burgundy, ombre, and fashion colors. No bleaching required!

entries.seo_title: Hair Textures - Body Wave, Straight, Deep Wave & More | Bakalr

data.name: Shop by Texture
data.description: Find your perfect texture. From sleek straight to bouncy curls, we have every texture to match your style.
data.short_description: Straight, body wave, deep wave & curly

data.name: Straight
data.description: Sleek and sophisticated straight hair bundles. Perfect for a polished, professional look.

data.name: Body Wave
data.description: Our most popular texture! Loose, flowing waves that add volume and movement.

data.name: Deep Wave
data.description: Defined, deep waves for a glamorous, voluminous look. Holds curl pattern beautifully.

data.name: Loose Wave
data.description: Relaxed, beachy waves for an effortlessly chic look.

data.name: Water Wave
data.description: Crimped, wet-look waves that give a fresh-from-the-beach vibe.

data.name: Curly
data.description: Bouncy, defined curls from loose curls to tight ringlets.

data.name: Kinky Curly
data.description: Natural-looking kinky curly texture that blends perfectly with 4A-4C hair types.

data.name: Kinky Straight
data.description: The perfect blowout texture. Mimics relaxed or blown-out natural hair.

entries.seo_description: Shop premium hair care products including shampoo, conditioner, treatments, and oils for natural and extension hair.

data.name: Hair Care
data.description: Keep your natural hair and extensions healthy with our premium selection of shampoos, conditioners, treatments, and oils.

data.name: Extension Care
data.description: Specially formulated products to keep your hair extensions looking fresh and lasting longer.

data.name: Shampoo & Conditioner
data.description: Gentle, sulfate-free formulas safe for natural hair and extensions.

data.name: Treatments & Oils
data.description: Intensive treatments and nourishing oils for healthy, shiny hair.

data.name: Leave-in Conditioners
data.description: Daily moisture and protection for your natural hair and extensions.

data.name: Hair Styling
data.description: Style your hair with confidence using our professional-grade gels, sprays, and styling products.

data.name: Gels & Edge Control
data.description: Keep your edges smooth and your style in place with our top-rated gels.

entries.seo_title: Wig Accessories & Installation Products | Bakalr Boutique

data.name: Wig Accessories
data.description: Everything you need for flawless wig installation. Wig caps, glue, tape, melting spray, and more.

data.name: Wig Glue & Adhesive
data.description: Professional-grade wig glues and adhesives for secure, long-lasting holds.

data.name: Wig Caps
data.description: Dome caps, stocking caps, and wig grips for comfortable, secure wig wear.

data.name: Lace Melting & Tint
data.description: Melt your lace seamlessly with our melting sprays, mousse, and lace tints.

data.name: Hair Tools
data.description: Professional-grade hair tools for salon-quality results at home.

data.name: Flat Irons & Straighteners
data.description: Professional flat irons for sleek, straight styles on natural hair and extensions.

data.name: Curling Wands & Irons
data.description: Create beautiful curls and waves with our professional curling tools.

data.name: Clippers & Trimmers
data.description: Professional barber clippers and trimmers for precision cuts.

entries.seo_title: Braiding Hair - Kanekalon, Marley & Crochet Hair | Bakalr

data.name: Braiding Hair
data.description: Premium synthetic braiding hair for box braids, twists, locs, and crochet styles.

data.name: Cosmetics
data.description: Complete your look with our selection of makeup and cosmetics.

data.name: False Lashes
data.description: Strip lashes, individual lashes, and magnetic lashes for every occasion.
